title: [FEATURE]  Add a few bindings...
body: Pleace add binding for method **SKImageFilter.CreateBlur** with TileMode argument, currently by default using ClampToBlack (Decal) tile mode, and also add binding for **SKSurface.Snapshot** with bounding rectangle. Thank you!

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: Moving this to v2.80 because it overlapped with a needed change.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
Fixed in #1356 and #1357 

Thanks for the issue!
